title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeOverview: The sound of the explosive is heard across the valley and the tremors are felt within the Atwal empire itself. Rinku decides to take charge of the operation but there’s another surprise in store for him.
